column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Not worth it.  After a night of boozing (Prohibition Tour)
column2: we came to Lou Malnati's for some pizza.  We checked in
column4: and waited patiently.  When we were finally seated
column5: we still had to wait quite a while for our food.  When we finally were served
column6: the pizza was just so-so.  The sauce was too garlicky
column7: the crust both doughy and crunchy
column8: the toppings too heavily proportioned.  It was good enough to take back to our hotel for a midnight snack
column9: but not so good I plan on going back.  My search for the perfect Chicago pizza continues.
